Adds iOS 9 and iPhone 6S compatibility! Restores ability to draw on lock screen Adds "Share..." functionality Fixes UI layout glitches on iPhone 6/6S Support for iOS7 and 64-bit
Adds line-thickness slider
Fixes ImageShack-related bugs uploading
Fixes various crashes
    v 1.7-1
  • Turned on support for Retina displays (much sharper drawing!)
    v 1.7
  • Added an on/off switch in settings that sets whether iWhiteBoard should show the "Drawing Mode Active" text. This way you can make videos/demonstrations without this distraction.
  • Removes (unwanted) instructional dialogue from screenshots/imageshack uploads initiated within the first few seconds of activation.
  • Built for iOS 5,4, and 3.
    v 1.6-1
  • iWhiteboard is now free!
    v 1.6
  • Eraser Mode
  • Smoother lines
  • Localized the buttons into French, German, Spanish, and Italian
  • Bug fix -- Can continue drawing without interruption during double taps
    v 1.5
  • Restored ability to draw dots (so you don't have to drag to start drawing)
  • Fixed iPad bug where the popup could get stuck
  • Full 4.0 capability (supports 3.0 to 4.0, including 3.2)
  • Will work on iPhone 4 when jailbreak is out.
    v 1.4
  • Fixed iPad UI bugs (now fully compatible)
  • Massive performance increase , drawing is 5 times smoother
  • Lower CPU/memory usage
    v 1.3
  • Added a color picker with over 100 new colors
  • Added a settings panel with options to disable, turn off triple-tap-to-clear, and line thickness. Still activated w/ Activator.
